attributes.action: Provide more funding & support for mental health services that's fit for purpose
attributes.additional_details: Fund mental health services so a proper service can be delivered that is fit for purpose
attributes.background: The suicide rates are at a heartbreaking staggering amount and the problem is only going to get worse as there's simple not enough funding into mental health services.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Increase funding and reduce waiting times for mental health services
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/705221
